meta.name: Money for Nothing
meta.desc: In England the currency is made up of pound, £, and pence, p, and there are eight coins in general circulation: 1p, 2p, 5p, 10p, 20p, 50p, £1 (100p) and £2 (200p). It is possible to make £2 in the following way: 1×£1 + 1×50p + 2×20p + 1×5p + 1×2p + 3×1p

goals.goal: How many different ways can £1 be made using any number of coins?.
How many different ways can £2 be made using any number of coins?.
How many different ways can £2.50 be made using any number of coins?
